author: Marshall Heyman
title: Dolce & Gabbana Stages a Star-Studded 4-Day New York Extravaganza
text:
HOW DO YOU cap off a series of over-the-top, Fellini-esque Dolce & Gabbana events at various New York landmarks? With another party, of course.
Italian fashion designers Domenico Dolce and Stefano Gabbana hosted a grand mix of celebrities and over 300 clients alike—many of whom flew in from Russia, China, Brazil and Canada—for three major affairs last weekend. The first, at the New York Public Library, on Friday, showed 120 pieces from the designers’ latest Alta Gioielleria collection--the brand’s high-end, Italian-made...
